knimeNode.name: Call OpenBabel
knimeNode.shortDescription: Molecular type conversion using OpenBabel toolkit. (Example implementation for an extension of the external tool node.)

fullDescription.intro: Molecular type conversion using OpenBabel toolkit. (Example implementation for an extension of the external tool node.) This node is not meant for real use but only demonstrates the extension of the external tool node.

ports.inPort: Table molecular structures to be converted.
